characters.name: Yuuji Itadori
alt_names: The Tiger of West Junior High
characters.description:
**Species:** Human
**Height:** 173 cm (5'8")
**Occupation:** Sorcerer, Student, Vessel
**Affiliation:** Jujutsu High

Yuuji is a fair person who cares greatly for not only his comrades but anyone he views as people with their own wills, despite how deep or shallow his connection to them is. He cares greatly for the "value of a life" and to this end, he will ensure that others receive a "proper death." He is easy to anger in the face of pure cruelty and unfair judgment of other people.
He doesn't have the born talent required to use cursed techniques, but he has incredible athletic abilities and he is considered very strong for his age, as shown by when he easily beat a coach in Steel Ball Throw.

characters.name: Megumi Fushiguro
characters.description:
__Species:__ Human
__Height:__ 175 cm (5'9")
__Occupation:__ Sorcerer, Student
__Affiliation:__ Jujutsu High
__Grade:__ Grade 2 Sorcerer
__Cursed Technique:__ 10 Shadows

Megumi is the deuteragonist of the Jujutsu Kaisen series. He is a first-year student at Jujutsu High and also a descendant of the Zenin Family.

While outwardly stoic and calculating, Megumi wishes to help protect people he sees as good or kind. He believes that the world is unfair and that a Sorcerer is a tool to ensure kind people are given more chances to live. Claiming it to be his selfish and irrational desire, he does not see himself as a hero for doing this.

characters.name: Satoru Gojou
characters.description:
__Height:__ 190 cm (6'3")
__Occupation:__ Jujutsu Sorcerer, Teacher
__Affiliation:__ Tokyo Metropolitan Curse Technical College, Gojou Family
__Grade:__ Special Grade Sorcerer
__Cursed Technique:__ Six Eyes, Limitless

Satoru Gojou is one of the main protagonists of the Jujutsu Kaisen series. He is a special-grade jujutsu sorcerer and is widely recognized as the strongest in the world. Satoru is the pride of the Gojou Family, the first person to inherit both the Limitless and the Six Eyes in four hundred years. He works as a teacher at the Tokyo Jujutsu High and uses his influence to protect and train strong young allies

characters.name: Nobara Kugisaki
characters.description:
__Height:__ 160 cm (5'3")
__Occupation:__ Jujutsu Sorcerer, Student
__Affiliation:__ Tokyo Jujutsu High
__Grade:__ Grade 3 Sorcerer

She is a first-year student and grade 3 jujutsu sorcerer at Tokyo Jujutsu High studying under Satoru Gojo alongside Yuji and Megumi.
 
Nobara is a confident and brash young woman with an unshakable character. More than anything, Nobara is determined to stay true to herself no matter what. She takes great pride in being both a pretty girl and a strong fighter, refusing to let anyone influence her.

Initially, Nobara can appear to be a very obnoxious and arrogant person. She first introduced herself to Yuji and Megumi by expressing how inferior they were. She also argued with Yuji for the greater part of their first mission together. Despite her abrasive attitude, Nobara is actually an incredibly caring and dutiful person, but would never let most people see that side of her. After fighting alongside each other in several missions, Yuji and Megumi grow to become Nobara's closest allies.

characters.name: Yuuta Okkotsu
characters.description:
__Species:__ Human
__Occupation:__ Sorcerer, Student
__Affiliation:__ Jujutsu High
__Grade:__ Special Grade Sorcerer

The main protagonist of Jujutsu Kaisen prequel series [Tokyo Metropolitan Curse Technical School](https://anilist.co/manga/105469/Tokyo-Toritsu-Jujutsu-Kodo-Senmon-Gakko). He was initially a Special Grade Cursed Victim haunted by his late childhood friend, Rika Orimoto. [Satoru Gojou](https://anilist.co/character/127691/Satoru-Gojou) mentored Yuuta and enrolled him at Tokyo Jujutsu High.

characters.name: Suguru Getou
characters.description:
__Species:__ Human
__Height:__ 183 cm
__Occupation:__ Curse User
__Grade:__ Special Grade Curse User
__Cursed Technique:__ Cursed Spirit Manipulation

Suguru Getou is an antagonist in both the Jujutsu Kaisen series and its prequel Jujutsu Kaisen 0: Jujutsu High. 

~!He was originally a student of Masamichi Yaga's alongside Satoru Gojo and Shoko Ieiri at Tokyo Jujutsu High. His experiences as a jujutsu sorcerer bred a deep hatred for non-sorcerers, leading to an incident where Suguru massacred over a hundred civilians in a single night, later being expelled from Jujutsu High and called for immediate execution as a result.!~

characters.name: Sukuna
characters.description:
__Species:__ Human, Reincarnated Sorcerer

According to the legend, Sukuna was a demon with four arms and two faces who lived in the golden era of sorcery 1000 years ago. Sorcerers of the era gave their all to defeat him, but to no avail. Without ever being defeated, his body was split into 20 separate indestructible cursed objects, which allowed him to live on and traverse the ages to come. In 2018, Yuuji Itadori consumed one of the aforementioned cursed objects, and Sukuna was reincarnated. 

~!In reality, Sukuna was not a demon, but rather a deformed human sorcerer. His body was able to be split up into 20 cursed objects because he received assistance from Kenjaku.!~

Sukuna is hedonistic and has no regard for the suffering of others, believing that suffering is natural for the weak. He is selfish, and always wants to stay in control of the situation without caring about the consequences.

characters.name: Mahito
characters.description:
__Grade__: Special Grade
__Cursed Technique:__ Idle Transfiguration

Mahito is one of the primary antagonists of the Jujutsu Kaisen series. He is a Cursed Spirit allied with Suguru Geto, Jogo, Hanami and several others. Their ultimate goal is the eradication of humanity and ultimately replacing the population with Cursed Spirits.

characters.name: Kento Nanami
characters.description:
__Height:__ 184 cm (6'0½")
__Occupation:__ Sorcerer
__Affiliation:__ Jujutsu High
__Grade:__ Grade 1 Sorcerer
__Cursed Technique:__ Ratio

He is a Grade 1 Jujutsu Sorcerer and a Tokyo Jujutsu High alumni. 

Nanami is a very intelligent and reserved man who at first appears to be someone who is just very serious about his work. He knows how to separate sentimentalism from service and claims he's only a Jujutsu Sorcerer because it's slightly less idiotic than regular careers. As one of [Yuji's](https://anilist.co/character/127212/Yuji-Itadori) mentors, Nanami is a complete contrast to [Gojo](https://anilist.co/character/127691/Satoru-Gojou), who is far more outspoken and easy-going.

characters.name: Maki Zenin
characters.description:
__Height:__ 170 cm (5'7")

Maki Zenin is the older twin sister of [Mai Zenin](https://anilist.co/character/134168/Mai-Zenin). Maki is a grade 4 sorcerer and a second-year at Tokyo Metropolitan Jujutsu Technical High School. She is from the main branch of the Zenin clan, one of the "Prominent Three Families" of the Jujutsu world.

She left the Zenin family in order to prove herself capable of being a Sorcerer after being deemed uncapable, since she lacks Cursed Energy.

~!Because Mai and Maki are monozygotic twins, their strength is considerably limited to one another. Monozygotic twins are considered as a single individual in the Jujutsu world and are a sign of bad omen.!~

~!After the death of her twin sister Mai, Maki has lost all of her cursed energy and gained a Heavenly Restriction. This causes her skills and human capabilities to be on par with [Toji Fushiguro's](https://anilist.co/character/162722/Touji-Fushiguro).!~

characters.name: Mai Zenin
characters.description:
__Height:__ 170 cm (5'7")

Mai Zenin is the younger twin sister of [Maki Zenin](https://anilist.co/character/134167/Maki-Zenin). Mai is a grade 3 sorcerer and a second-year at Kyoto Jujutsu Technical High School. As a child, Mai always relied on Maki since she was afraid of Cursed Spirits. 

~!Because Mai and Maki are monozygotic twins, their strength is considerably limited to one another. Monozygotic twins are considered as a single individual in the Jujutsu world and are a sign of bad omen.!~

~!In chapter 149, Mai decides to sacrifice herself in order to make Maki stronger.!~

characters.name: Panda
characters.description:
__Species:__ Cursed Corpse (varies among 3 personalities)
__Occupation:__ Jujutsu Sorcerer, Student
__Affiliation:__ Jujutsu High
__Grade:__ 2

He is a second-year at Tokyo Prefectural Jujutsu High. As a Metamorphosed Cursed Corpse, he is the best creation of Principal [Masamichi Yaga](https://anilist.co/character/189237/Masamichi-Yaga). He is sentient and has three cores inside the doll body: the youngest brother "Panda", the eldest brother "Gorilla" and a sister.

characters.name: Aoi Toudou
characters.description:
__Species:__ Human
__Height:__ 190 cm
__Occupation:__ Sorcerer, Student
__Affiliation:__ Kyoto Jujutsu Technical High School
__Grade:__ Grade 1 Sorcerer

Toudou is a third-year student at Kyoto Jujutsu Technical High School who possesses inhuman physical strength, durability, and speed. 

~!He is able to use a technique called Boogie Woogie, in which he can switch the position of two things that posses a certain amount of curse energy within his range.!~

characters.name: Kasumi Miwa
characters.description:
__Species:__ Human
__Occupation:__ Jujutsu Sorcerer, Student
__Affiliation:__ Kyoto Metropolitan Curse Technical College
__Grade:__ Grade 3 Sorcerer

A second-year at Kyoto Metropolitan Curse Technical College. Kasumi is a hard-working, restrained, and considerate pacifist. She is also a big fan of [Satoru Gojo](https://anilist.co/character/127691).

~!She has a very close bond with Mechamaru, their friendship is first seen in the Tournament Arc when Miwa offers him a battery telling him not to eat it as Mai and Momo laugh in the background. In the Shibuya Arc, she is seen mourning his death on the train. Over the course of the Tournament Arc and Shibuya Arc it is very apparent their friendship grows as they both strived towards becoming closer to one another. As she mourns his death on the train she holds a mini Mechamaru speaker which tells her to find her happiness. After the recording finishes, she holds the speaker to her heart and cries. The entire Kyoto program seems very distressed by his death on the train. When later entering the battle Miwa is quick to activate her technique out of rage and sadness towards Mahito.!~

characters.name: Jougo
characters.description:
__Grade:__ Special Grade Cursed Spirit

Jogou is an unregistered special grade cursed spirit aligned with Mahito, Hanami, and Dagon. He was born of humanity's fear and negative association with volcanoes and other fire-related natural disasters. This resulted in a highly intelligent cursed spirit with massive levels of cursed energy even for a special grade. Jogou believes curses are the true humans and desires a world where his kind dominates the earth.

characters.name: Toge Inumaki
characters.description:
__Species:__ Human
__Occupation:__ Sorcerer, Student
__Affiliation:__ Jujutsu High
__Grade:__ Grade 2 Sorcerer
__Cursed Technique:__ Cursed Speech

He is a second-year at Tokyo Metropolitan Jujutsu Technical High School. Due to his curse ability, he is only willing to communicate with ingredients used to make rice balls.

characters.name: Chousou
characters.description:
Chousou is half human and half cursed spirit and the first of the Death Painting Wombs with a Special Grade rank. He and his two brothers, Kechizu and Eso are Cursed Womb: Death Paintings who have sided with Mahito's group.

Chousou bears strong attachments to his brothers and is very overprotective of them. ~!However, after receiving a vision during his battle with Itadori, Chousou was eventually convinced that Sukuna's vessel was actually one of his younger brothers. He then became furious at Mahito and the other cursed spirits for manipulating him into harming Itadori.!~

~!Chousou is one of nine death painting wombs that came from a woman capable of giving birth to cursed spirit children. At some point, Chousou and his brothers were stored at the Jujutsu High, along with some of Sukuna's fingers.

As stated by Chousou himself, Noritoshi Kamo, the man who experimented on his mother is in fact his third "parent" due to him having mixed in his own blood into Chousou when his mother was pregnant with him. Although seemingly not remembering much about his own past, it is evident that Chousou himself remembers Noritoshi and holds a grudge against him for toying with his mother and siblings' lives.!~

characters.name: Junpei Yoshino
characters.description: A student at Satozakura High School.

characters.name: Mei Mei
characters.description:
__Height:__  173 cm
__Occupation:__ Jujutsu Sorcerer
__Affiliation:__ Jujutsu High
__Grade:__ Grade 1 Sorcerer
__Family:__ Ui Ui (Younger Brother)

__Abilities__:
~!
__Weapon Mastery__: Mei Mei wields a large battle-axe. 
__Cursed Technique__: Black Bird Manipulation - Mei Mei is able to control crows as well as see through their eyes, making her technique great for recon.
__Bird Strike__: by forcing a crow to commit suicide, the trade-off is to erase the Cursed Energy limit of a typical weak bird and hurl it at the enemy.
!~

Mei Mei is a grade 1 jujutsu sorcerer who works independently and only in exchange for money. She is also the older sister of Ui Ui. 

~!She was the senpai of Satoru Gojo and Suguru Geto during their time at Jujutsu High.!~

characters.name: Utahime Iori
characters.description: A first grade sorcerer and a teacher at Kyoto Jujutsu Technical High School.

characters.name: Takuma Ino
characters.description:
__Species:__ Human
__Occupation:__ Sorcerer
__Affiliation:__ Jujutsu High
__Grade:__ Grade 2 Sorcerer

Takuma Ino is a grade 2 jujutsu sorcerer and a close associate of Kento Nanami who operates out of Tokyo Jujutsu High.

Takuma Ino is a genuine and cheerful person with a more positive outlook on things than most jujutsu sorcerers. He doesn't believe he's the smartest person around and has a lot of respect for Nanami. Whenever Ino finds himself in a tough situation, he asks himself what would Nanami do.

characters.name: Noritoshi Kamo
characters.description: A shaman who lived around 150 years ago, known as the most evil shaman in history.

characters.name: Yoshinobu Gakuganji
characters.description: The principal of Kyoto Jujutsu Technical High School.

characters.name: Momo Nishimiya
characters.description:
__Species:__ Human
__Occupation:__ Jujutsu Sorcerer
__Affiliation:__  Kyoto Magic Technical College
__Grade:__ Semi-Grade 2 Sorcerer
__Cursed Technique:__ Tool Manipulation

She is a third-year at Kyoto Magic Technical College.

characters.name: Shouko Ieiri
characters.description:
__Height:__ 168 cm
__Ability:__ Reverse Healing Cursed Technique

Alumnus of Tokyo Jujutsu High, having been classmates with [Satoru Gojo](https://anilist.co/character/127691) and [Suguru Geto](https://anilist.co/character/133699). After graduating into a full-fledged jujutsu sorcerer, Shoko became the school's primary doctor.

characters.name: Touji Fushiguro
characters.description: Touji Fushiguro, born Touji Zenin, is the father of [Megumi Fushiguro](https://anilist.co/character/126635/). He took a job from the Star Religious Group to assassinate the Star Plasma Vessel.

characters.name: Hanami
characters.description:
__Species:__ Cursed Spirit

Hanami is an antagonist intent on ridding the Earth of Humans and reviving Sukuna.

characters.name: Naobito Zenin
characters.description:
__Species:__ Human
__Height:__ 184 cm
__Age:__ Unknown
__Hair Color:__ Grey
__Occupation:__ The 26th head of House Zenin
__Affiliation:__ House Zenin
__Grade:__ Grade 1 Sorcerer

characters.name: Masamichi Yaga
characters.description:
He is the current principal of Tokyo Metropolitan Jujutsu Technical High School, the creator of Panda, and the headmaster of Satoru Gojo, Suguru Geto and Shoko Ieiri.

~!After the Shibuya incident Yaga is given a death penalty by the higher ups for inciting Gojo and Geto in the past and "causing the Shibuya incident".!~

characters.name: Kiyotaka Ijichi
characters.description: An assistant manager at Tokyo Prefectural Jujutsu High School.

characters.name: Nagi Yoshino
characters.description:
__Species:__ Human

Nagi Yoshino is the mother of Junpei Yoshino.

Nagi is a friendly, laid-back woman who cared deeply for her son. She's eager for him to make friends and took a liking to Yuji immediately.
As a mother, she has some irresponsible tendencies. She was a smoker and drinker who allowed Junpei to skip school if she wished. Nagi believes that her son could take a different avenue other than education to be successful in life.

After just one meeting, Yuji recognized that Junpei's mother was a great person.

characters.name: Wasuke Itadori
characters.description: Yuji's Grandfather is shown to be a selfless, caring man who taught Yuji to help others. He was also short tempered and stubborn, to the point he would yell at Yuji for visiting him every day and buying him flowers. This temper meant that nobody else wanted to visit him and he tells his grandson to avoid dying alone.

characters.name: Yuki Tsukumo
characters.description: One of the four Special Grade Sorcerers.

characters.name: Kinji Hakari
characters.description: Kinji Hakari is a character in the Jujutsu Kaisen series. He is a third-year student at Tokyo Jujutsu High who is currently suspended for clashing with authority. While away from the school, Kinji is running a fight club between sorcerers for money.

characters.name: Riko Amanai
characters.description:
Riko Amanai is a student at Renchoku Girls' Junior High and the designated Star Plasma Vessel for Master Tengen's merger in 2006.

~!She was later killed by Toji Fushiguro in the same arc.!~

characters.name: Dagon
characters.description:
__Affiliation:__ Mahito’s group

Dagon is a antagonist who starts off as a cursed womb but later turns into a powerful cursed spirit.  He starts off by being accompanied by Jogo and Hanami.

characters.name: Atsuya Kusakabe
characters.description:
Atsuya Kusakabe is a character in Jujutsu Kaisen. He is a Grade 1 Sorcerer, and a teacher at Jujutsu High.

~!At the end of the Shibuya Incident Arc he blocks Kenjaku's Maximum Uzumaki Technique.!~

characters.name: Juuzou Kumiya
characters.description: A curse user who wields an axe.

characters.name: Naoya Zenin
characters.description: Naoya Zenin is one of the sons of Naobito Zenin and believes himself to be the true heir of the Zenin Family.

characters.name: Haruta Shigemo
characters.description: A curse user working with Mahito. He loves picking on the weak.

characters.name: Koukichi Muta
characters.description: Koukichi Muta is a Semi-Grade 1 sorcerer and a second-year student at Kyoto Jujutsu High. He attends school by controlling the cursed corpse Ultimate Mechamaru, as Muta was born with a sickly and fragile body due to a Heavenly Restriction. In exchange, he has a nearly boundless amount of cursed energy that spreads over a vast range.

characters.name: Uraume
alt_names: Shiraga no Jusoshi (白髪の呪詛師)
characters.description:
__Gender:__ Unknown 

A  curse user from a thousand years ago who is a direct subordinate to Sukuna.

characters.name: Esou
characters.description:
__Cursed Technique__ Rot

Eso is an antagonist in the Jujutsu Kaisen series. He is a Cursed Womb: Death Painting and the middle brother of Choso and Kechizu.

characters.name: Kechizu
characters.description:
__Cursed Technique:__ Rot

Kechizu is an antagonist in the Jujutsu Kaisen series. He is a Cursed Womb: Death Painting and the youngest brother of Choso and Eso. Kechizu and Eso serve as the primary antagonists of the Death Painting Arc.

characters.name: Akari Nitta
characters.description: Akari Nitta is an Auxiliary Manager at Jujutsu High.

characters.name: Ui Ui
characters.description: Ui Ui is a sorcerer and the younger brother of Mei Mei.

characters.name: Tengen
characters.description:
Tengen, often referred to as Master Tengen is a supporting character in Jujutsu Kaisen. They are an immortal jujutsu sorcerer that remains within their chamber; the Tombs of the Star Corridor at all times in order to reinforce the barriers that protect both Jujutsu High locations.

Master Tengen is also known as the "Star". They were responsible for preaching the foundation of jujutsu sorcerers and spawning religious groups that worship the Star as their deity.

characters.name: Hana Kurusu
characters.description: Hana is a young girl with as light colored eyes and short light hair with bangs that curve inward. She wears a large turtleneck sweater, dark pants and heeled ankle boots. She appears to have a halo and a pair of wings.

characters.name: Ogi Zenin
characters.description: He is the brother of Naobito Zenin and father of Maki and Mai Zenin. He believes he couldn't become head of the clan because his kids are worthless.

characters.name: Mimiko Hasaba
characters.description: Mimiko Hasaba is a character in Jujutsu Kaisen and Jujutsu Kaisen 0: Jujutsu High. She is an ally of Suguru Geto.

characters.name: Nanako Hasaba
characters.description: Nanako Hasaba is a character in Jujutsu Kaisen and Jujutsu Kaisen 0: Jujutsu High. She is [Mimiko](https://anilist.co/character/228986/Mimiko-Hasaba)'s twin sister and they were both allies of Suguru Geto.

characters.name: Ranta Zenin
characters.description:
He is a member of the Zenin Family and its elite unit of jujutsu sorcerers, the Hei.

~!He is later killed by Maki after confronting her with Jinichi.!~

characters.name: Jinichi Zenin
characters.description:
He is a high ranking member of the Zenin Family and a member of its elite unit of jujutsu sorcerers, the Hei.

~!He is later decapitated by Maki after their confrontation.!~

characters.name: Choujurou Zenin
characters.description:
Heis a member of the Zenin Family and its elite unit of jujutsu sorcerers, the Hei.

~!He is later killed by Maki after getting stabbed in the throat with one of her blades.!~

characters.name: Nobuaki Zenin
characters.description:
He is a member of the Zenin Family and captain of its Kukuru Unit, which is a unit specialized in martial arts for clan members that aren't sorcerers. 

~!He is later stabbed in the throat by Maki after confronting her in her rampage.!~

characters.name: Kirara Hoshi
characters.description: A third-year student at Tokyo Jujutsu High who is currently suspended for clashing with authority. While away from the school, Kirara has partnered with Kinji while running his fight club. Their cursed technique is Interstellar Flight (Love Rendezvous), a complex technique whose motif is based on the Southern Cross constellation.

characters.name: Hajime Kashimo
characters.description: Hajime Kashimo is a sorcerer from 400 years ago, currently inhabiting the body of someone Kenjaku prepared as a vessel, and has served as a player in the Culling Game, seeking to find and consequently battle Sukuna

characters.name: Hiromi Higuruma
characters.description: A defense lawyer who deems the Japanese justice system as unfair. After losing another case, he realizes his client was going to be ruled guilty from the beginning. With these negative emotions, he awakened his cursed power in the courtroom demanding a retrial. He is currently the top player of the Culling Game.

characters.name: Misato Kuroi
characters.description: Misato is the caretaker of the star plasma vessel Riko Amanai. She is a kind woman who cares deeply for Riko beyond a professional level. They love one another as family and Misato is extremely loyal to her.

characters.name: Larue
characters.description: A large, shirtless muscular man and an ally of [Suguru Getou](https://anilist.co/character/133699/).

characters.name: Miguel
characters.description: He was initially one of Suguru Geto's commanders who wished to see him become king. Following the Night Parade of a Hundred Demons, Miguel was forcefully recruited by Satoru Gojo. He returned to his homeland of Africa and the community of sorcerers there to train Yuta Okkotsu.

characters.name: Charles Bernard
alt_names: シャルル・ベルナール
characters.description: Aspiring manga artist that joins the culling game.

characters.name: Kurourushi
characters.description: Kurourushi is a special grade cockroach cursed spirit released from Kenjaku's Cursed Spirit Manipulation in order to participate in the Culling Game as a player.

characters.name: Fumihiko Takaba
characters.description:
__Species:__ Human
__Occupation:__ Comedian

He is a failing comedian who was turned into a sorcerer by Kenjaku in order to participate in the Culling Game.

Fumihiko is an exceptionally goofy individual whose jokes aren't funny, but he still lives to entertain above all else. He found himself failing as a comedian and was down on his luck. A co-worker encouraged him to keep going because there's always a demand for comedians who think they're funny. Takaba acts on those words and has a very energetic attitude. He's very outspoken and comedy-focused in everything he does.

characters.name: Ryu Ishigori
characters.description:
__Species:__ Human 
__Occupation:__ Jujutsu Sorcerer

 He is a jujutsu sorcerer from the past who was incarnated by Kenjaku to participate in the Culling Game as a player.

Ryu is a classic hotshot that both men and women admire. In his past life, he enjoyed both a good fight and the company of ladies. Even though Ryu has no regrets, he likens his previous life to a "moderate eater" with no "dessert" to satisfy him. Ryu intends to use his second life to seek a worthy opponent to fulfill his insatiable hunger. Despite his persistent desire for combat, he appears calm and rational. Yuta further speculates that his point score in the Culling Game is a result of Ryu's choice not to target ordinary citizens but also his indifference to their deaths due to collateral damage in his fights.

characters.name: Yuu Haibara
characters.description:
__Species:__ Human
__Height:__ 176 cm (5'9")
__Occupation:__ Sorcerer, Student
__Affiliation:__ Jujutsu High

A first-year student at Tokyo Metropolitan Jujutsu Technical High School in 2006, along with [Kento Nanami](https://anilist.co/character/133704/Kento-Nanami).

~!In 2007, he is killed during a mission with Nanami to exorcise a Grade 2 cursed spirit that was underestimated to be a Grade 1 spirit instead. His death heavily impacted Nanami, as Nanami was the only second year remaining after Haibara's death, and also led him to reconsider being a Jujutsu sorcerer.!~

characters.name: Takako Uro
characters.description:
__Species:__ Human 
__Occupation:__ Jujutsu Sorcerer

Takako Uro She is a jujutsu sorcerer from the past who was incarnated by Kenjaku for the Culling Game. In her first life, Takako Uro was the captain of the Sun, Moon, and Stars Squad, a group of assassins affiliated with the Toh.

characters.name: Jin Itadori
characters.description: He is the father of [Yuji Itadori](https://anilist.co/character/127212/Yuuji-Itadori) and son of [Wasuke Itadori](https://anilist.co/character/194074/Wasuke-Itadori).

characters.name: Kenjaku
characters.description:
__Species:__ Human
__Height:__ 183 cm
__Occupation:__ Curse User
__Cursed Technique:__ Cursed Spirit Manipulation

Kenjaku is one of the primary antagonists of the Jujutsu Kaisen series. He is an ancient sorcerer who pursues the goal of "evolving" humanity via cursed energy, thereby ushering in a new golden age of jujutsu sorcery paralleling the Heian Era.

~!Using his cursed technique that allows him to transplant his brain into different bodies to possess them, he has inhabited different people throughout the centuries, assuming different identities.!~

characters.name: Shiu Kong
characters.description: A handler for the Time Vessel Association.

characters.name: Reggie Star
characters.description: He is a jujutsu sorcerer from the past ~!who was incarnated to participate in the Culling Game. Rejii led his own group of sorcerers and served as an antagonist for the Culling Game Arc.!~

characters.name: Yorozu
characters.description: Yorozu is a character in the Jujutsu Kaisen series. She was a jujutsu sorcerer from a thousand years ago ~!who was incarnated using [Tsumiki Fushiguro](https://anilist.co/character/193479/Tsumiki-Fushiguro)'s body for the Culling Game. In her first life during the Heian era, Yorozu was a powerful sorcerer from Ainu who was obsessed with [Sukuna](https://anilist.co/character/133701/Sukuna).!~

characters.name: Niji Ebina
characters.description: Niji Ebina is a minor antagonist in the Jujutsu Kaisen series. He was a curse user who aligned himself with [Kenjaku](https://anilist.co/character/289584/Kenjaku) during the Shibuya Incident.

characters.name: Ogami
characters.description: Ogami is a minor antagonist in the Jujutsu Kaisen series. She was a curse user who worked with Jirou Awasaka in the past to make money. ~!However, their freedom to commit crimes and curse people stopped with [Satoru Gojou](https://anilist.co/character/127691/Satoru-Gojou)'s birth. Determined to reclaim their past lives, Ogami, Awasaka, and her grandson aligned themselves with [Kenjaku](https://anilist.co/character/289584/Kenjaku) during the Shibuya Incident.!~

characters.name: Jirou Awasaka
characters.description: Jirou Awasaka is a minor antagonist in the Jujutsu Kaisen series. He is a curse user who used to kill and collect money as much as he pleased until [Satoru Gojou](https://anilist.co/character/127691/Satoru-Gojou) was born. ~!He was recruited for the Shibuya Incident by [Kenjaku](https://anilist.co/character/289584/Kenjaku) and Uraume to guard a set of commissioned curtains and kill jujutsu sorcerers.!~

characters.name: Manami Suda
characters.description: Curse user who used to be [Suguru Getou](https://anilist.co/character/133699/Suguru-Getou)'s secretary as well as a commander in his "family" of sorcerers. ~!After Suguru's death, Manami and Toshihisa Negi both decided to carry on his will by joining the entity to who stole his body.!~

characters.name: Toshihisa Negi
characters.description: Curse user who used to be a commander in [Suguru Getou](https://anilist.co/character/133699/Suguru-Getou)'s "family" of sorcerers. After Suguru's death, Negi and Manami Suda both decided to carry on his will by joining the entity to who stole his body.

characters.name: Tsumiki Fushiguro
characters.description:
~! Megumi's older sister.!~

~! Tsumiki was unknowingly chosen by Kenjaku to be a participant of the Culling Game and made into the incarnated host of Yorozu !~

characters.name: Yatsuka no Tsurugi Ikaishinshou Makora
alt_names: 八握剣異戒神将魔虚羅
Eight-Handled Sword Divergent Sila Divine General Mahoraga
characters.description: The most powerful shikigami of the Ten Shadows Technique.

characters.name: Arata Nitta
characters.description: Arata Nitta is a first-year student at Kyoto Jujutsu High and the younger brother of Akari Nitta.

characters.name: Kaori Itadori
characters.description: Wife of Jin Itadori and the biological mother of Yuuji Itadori.

characters.name: Nobuko Takada
characters.description:
__Height:__ 180 cm

Aoi Toudou's favorite idol.

characters.name: Hanyu
characters.description: Hanyu is a minor antagonist in the Jujutsu Kaisen series. ~!She and her partner Haba are Culling Game players who targeted rookies in the Tokyo No. 1 Colony until they were both defeated by [Yuuji Itadori](https://anilist.co/character/127212/Yuuji-Itadori).!~

characters.name: Rin Amai
characters.description: Rin Amai is a minor character in the Jujutsu Kaisen series. ~!He was a citizen of Sendai City until he was involuntarily turned into a sorcerer by [Kenjaku](https://anilist.co/character/289584/Kenjaku) and forced to participate in the Culling Game.!~

characters.name: Youtou
characters.description: Youtou are weak insect-like curse ranked lower than grade 4.

characters.name: Yubi no Kishu
characters.description: Finger Bearers are a type of special grade cursed spirit that emerge from the cursed wombs spawned from eating one of [Sukuna](https://anilist.co/character/133701/Sukuna)'s fingers.

characters.name: Noritoshi Kamo no Chichi
characters.description: [Noritoshi Kamo](https://anilist.co/character/157866/Noritoshi--Kamo) no Chichi was the head of the Kamo clan ~!until he was secretly disposed of by [Kenjaku](https://anilist.co/character/289584/Kenjaku).!~

characters.name: Kuchisake-Onna
characters.description: Kuchisake-Onna was an imaginary vengeful cursed spirit controlled and used by [Suguru Getou](https://anilist.co/character/133699/Suguru-Getou)'s Cursed Spirit Manipulation technique.

characters.name: Shino
characters.description: Shino is a member of the Kamo clan. This one seemed to know Noritoshi Kamo, then Kenjaku, ~!and also seems to support him in his position as clan leader.!~

characters.name: Haba
characters.description: Haba is a minor antagonist in the Jujutsu Kaisen series. He and his partner Hanyu were Culling Game players who targetted rookies in the Tokyo No. 1 Colony ~!until they were both defeated by [Yuuji Itadori](https://anilist.co/character/127212/Yuuji-Itadori).!~

characters.name: Remi
characters.description: She was a normal human turned jujutsu sorcerer by [Kenjaku](https://anilist.co/character/289584/Kenjaku) for the Culling Game. ~!Remi aligned herself with [Reggie Star](https://anilist.co/character/306194/Reggie-Star)'s group who all serve as antagonists for the Culling Game Arc.!~

characters.name: Iori Hazenoki
characters.description: He is a jujutsu sorcerer from the past ~!who was incarnated by [Kenjaku](https://anilist.co/character/289584/Kenjaku) for the Culling Game. Hazenoki aligned himself with [Reggie Star](https://anilist.co/character/306194/Reggie-Star)'s group, who all serve as antagonists for the Culling Game Arc.!~

characters.name: Chizuru Hari
characters.description: He was a jujutsu sorcerer participating in the Culling Game and was aligned with [Reggie Star](https://anilist.co/character/306194/Reggie-Star)'s group.

characters.name: Mago
characters.description: ~!He is not actually Ogami's grandson, but rather one of the numerous children she kidnapped and raised after falsifying their relationship.!~

characters.name: Ganesha
characters.description: Ganesha is a curse summoned by [Kenjaku](https://anilist.co/character/289584/Kenjaku).

characters.name: Batta no Noroi
characters.description: Grade 2 Cursed Spirit born from humanity's hatred of the grasshopper plague. ~![Yuuji Itadori](https://anilist.co/character/127212/Yuuji-Itadori) encountered it on B2F of Meiji-Jingumae Station while it was guarding the commissioned curtain there.!~

characters.name: Keshin Tamamo no Mae
characters.description: Keshin Tamamo no Mae is an imaginary vengeful cursed spirit and one of the sixteen special grade cursed spirits. It was controlled and used by [Suguru Getou](https://anilist.co/character/133699/Suguru-Getou)'s Cursed Spirit Manipulation technique.

characters.name: Housougami
characters.description: Housougami was a special grade disease cursed spirit ~!summoned by Pseudo-Getou ([Kenjaku](https://anilist.co/character/289584/Kenjaku)) using Cursed Spirit Manipulation.!~

characters.name: Rokujuushi Miyo
characters.description: Rokujushi Miyo is the incarnation of a sumo enthusiast and is currently participating in the Culling Game.

characters.name: Hagane Daidou
characters.description: He is the incarnation of a nameless master swordsman and is currently participating in the Culling Game.

characters.name: Dhruv Lakdawalla
alt_names: ドルゥヴ・ラクダワラ
characters.description: He is a jujutsu sorcerer from the past ~!who was incarnated by [Kenjaku](https://anilist.co/character/289584/Kenjaku) for the Culling Game. This is the second incarnation for the veteran sorcerer who once conquered Japan on his own during the Civil War of Wa.!~

characters.name: Bayer
characters.description: Bayer is a minor antagonist in the Jujutsu Kaisen series. He is a soldier formerly aligned with a faction of curse users called Q.

characters.name: Koukun
characters.description: Koukun is a minor antagonist in the Jujutsu Kaisen series. He is a soldier formerly aligned with a faction of curse users called Q.

characters.name: Shigeru Sonoda
characters.description: A non-curse user representative of the Time Vessel Association in 2006.

characters.name: Fumi
characters.description: Fumi is a minor character in the Jujutsu Kaisen series. She is [Nobara Kugisaki](https://anilist.co/character/133700/Nobara-Kugisaki)'s childhood friend.

characters.name: Garry K. Johnson
alt_names: ギャリー・K・ジョンソン
characters.description: Garry K. Johnson is a character in the Jujutsu Kaisen series. He is the Lieutenant General of the U.S. Army and the Commander of its Joint Special Operations unit. ~!He is leading the military operation to abduct jujutsu sorcerers from Japan under orders from the President.!~

characters.name: Keita Oue
characters.description: Keita Oue is a minor character in the Jujutsu Kaisen series. He was the defendant in a murder case where he was represented by [Hiromi Higuruma](https://anilist.co/character/248818/Hiromi-Higuruma) and unjustly found guilty.

characters.name: Cyrus Veil
characters.description: Cyrus Veil is a character in the Jujutsu Kaisen series. He is the Under Secretary for the United States Office of Energy and Environment. ~!As a consultant to the President, it was Cyrus who convinced the government to coordinate with [Kenjaku](https://anilist.co/character/289584/Kenjaku)'s plan to abduct jujutsu sorcerers for energy research.!~

characters.name: Taichi Kanada
characters.description:
__Height:__ 175 cm

Taichi Kanada is an alumni of Saitama Urami East Junior High ~!and was one of four victims who were cursed as a result of bungee jumping from Yasohachi Bridge. Like the other cursed humans, Taichi died after a cursed spirit appeared between his auto-lock doors, which were stuck wide open.!~

characters.name: Furudate
characters.description: Furudate is a minor character in the Jujutsu Kaisen series. He is the executor of [Naobito Zenin](https://anilist.co/character/188432/Naobito-Zenin)'s will.

characters.name: Saori
characters.description: Saori was a good friend of [Nobara Kugisaki](https://anilist.co/character/133700/Nobara-Kugisaki), before she left her village.

characters.name: Tadashi Okazaki
characters.description: Tadashi Okazaki was a minor character serving time at the Eishu Juvenile Detention Center.

characters.name: Yuuko Ozawa
characters.description: Former middle school classmate of [Yuuji Itadori](https://anilist.co/character/127212/Yuuji-Itadori).

characters.name: Setsuko Sasaki
characters.description: Sasaki is a second-year student at Sugisawa Third High School and a member of school's Occult Research Club alongside her friends [Yuuji Itadori](https://anilist.co/character/127212/Yuuji-Itadori) and [Takeshi Iguchi](https://anilist.co/character/200767/Takeshi-Iguchi).

characters.name: Takeshi Iguchi
characters.description: Iguchi is a second-year student at Sugisawa Third High School and a member of school's Occult Research Club alongside his friends [Yuuji Itadori](https://anilist.co/character/127212/Yuuji-Itadori) and [Setsuko Sasaki](https://anilist.co/character/200765).

characters.name: Takagi
characters.description: Takagi is the athletics club advisor teacher at Sugisawa Third High School.

characters.name: Sotomura
characters.description: Sotomura is a teacher at Satozakura High School, where [Junpei Yoshino](https://anilist.co/character/157214/Junpei--Yoshino) attends.

characters.name: Shouta Itou
characters.description: Shouta is a high school student from Satozakura High School.

characters.name: Takeda
characters.description: Takeda is one of the faculty members at Saitama Urami East Junior High and has been since even before Megumi Fushiguro attended there.

characters.name: Kakunou Jurei
characters.description: A cursed spirit that can store many different objects within its body. First seen as the servant of Touji Fushiguro, it contains Touji's entire wide arsenal of weapons.
